title: No smite till level 10
body: so i made a smurf and got in a couple of games,jg was the last role  in a couple of them and i was unable to jg like why even do that you should be able to jg as soon as you hit 3

replies.body:
Well i'm not sure about that maybe they made it so you can learn more about the jungle first.

Like, my role is a jungler, before i leveled up and got smite i didn't know anything about it. Like the buffs and stuff.

I hope this helped you =D

i just think its stupid really like i get that they might want you to be a higher level and more skilled  player but what about all the stubborn people who call a lane and wont let you swap even though you dont have smite, making us duo top till level 10 its just annoying ahha

you should be duo top till lvl 20-25. one MIGHT take smite to secure buffs and dragons and baron, but you shouldnt go into the jungle till you have the right champs and runes for it. usually around 200 wins you start getting the IP enough for it all.

New jungle camps do tonnes of damage. Without decent runes/masteries jungling is pathetically inefficient. People don't expect you to jungle until level 20ish unless you are in a game with other smurfs.
of course you can if your smart about it you dont need any runes and masteries thats why there is a jg role with out it until 10 you have to duo top whoch is a bad habit to get in to

the 1-1-2 meta is a bad habit. in no way should you be forced to do something at low levels of play because it works in the pro scene.

duo top works and always has.
the jungle is too strong to do effectively without both the knowledge of the role AND correct runes and masteries. even lvl 10 is too soon to be jungling. the idea of smite being available at lvl 10 is for securing the late game objectives dragon and baron, not for being able to jungle in low level games.

It requires skill and knowledge that only smurfs would have. For completely new players duo top is a healthy way to learn the game, learn champions (new players generally only get exposed to what is in the meta) and learn teamwork. Having earlier smite in this jungle would a noob trap with hardly any of them being able to jungle efficiently and not get executed.
duo top...like you are MEANT TO DO....jeez
when below 20 you shouldn't jg its way to hard
Sry man i don't know what to say that bothers me as well.
lel noob just warwick ujungle dont even need smite little noob little nooby noob.
